page.title: 20CONTRIBUTORS AND CREDITS
page.content:
The pupils of Class One, Old Cleeve V.C. First School would like to thank all the parents and friends who have helped in providing information for this disc. We would especially like to thank :- Mrs Makin ---- Youth Club Mrs Moss ---- Roadwater Mr Burns ---- Primary Support Mr Brewer --- Head, Croydon Hall Mr and Mrs Takle --- Farmer 'John' ---- pupil Mr and Mrs Stevens ---- Transport Mrs Clarke --- Skittles Mrs Notely --- Teacher Old Cleeve Mr Large --- Roadwater Mr Saunders --- Head, Old Cleeve Mr and Mrs Watts ---- Farmer Mr Foster ---- Farmer Mr Thomas ---- Farmer
